about_the_game:
An original soundtrack of 33 breakcore tunes, all composed by milkypossum, for the game Picayune Dreams.

'Interstellar' lyrics

interstellar
minds together
bless this hell
we'll die together

disjointed in a state of disrepair
conforming just to save the unaware
to repent atone for sins
bargaining for our uncertain endings
programming our grand demise
upgrade downgrade back to default settings

disrepair....
unaware....
pure despair...
so unfair...

and I cannot get away, I can't escape, are we awake? Oh I don't know anymore,
and I'm losing all my senses every time I make advances, so what are we good for?
we're so mindless, in pursuit of a good ending when we don't know what that even feels like,
I can hardly tell if I am even breathing at this rate, are we alive out of spite?

An original soundtrack of 33 breakcore tunes, all composed by milkypossum, for the game Picayune Dreams.

'Interstellar' lyrics

interstellar
minds together
bless this hell
we'll die together

conforming just to save the unaware
to repent atone for sins
bargaining for our uncertain endings

upgrade downgrade back to default settings

disrepair....
unaware....
pure despair...
so unfair...

and I cannot get away, I can't escape, are we awake? Oh I don't know anymore,
and I'm losing all my senses every time I make advances, so what are we good for?
we're so mindless, in pursuit of a good ending when we don't know what that even feels like,
I can hardly tell if I am even breathing at this rate, are we alive out of spite?
name: Picayune Dreams Soundtrack
short_description: Official Soundtrack of Picayune Dreams, composed by milkpossum
